OCD.name: Extract Directed Network from Table
OCD.description: Given a table, this algorithm creates a directed network by placing a directed edge between the values in a given column to the values of a different column.

AD.name: Source Column
AD.description: The column to draw the source information from

AD.name: Target Column
AD.description: The column to which the source column creates edges to.

AD.name: Text Delimiter
AD.description: The character that separates values in table columns.

AD.name: Aggregate Function File
AD.description: The name of a file that contains functions to perform on the data.
